subject: Problem with Simsonn Plus X
description_text:
Hey, I'm having a problem with my Simsonn Plus x joysticks.
Everything works fine in the software, but not so well in the game.
It constantly shows that I have the gas and brake pressed halfway (the
clutch works normally). Additionally, when I press the brake pedal just a
millimeter, the game slider shows that I'm pressing it about 20%.
In the control panel, it looks like this.
[image: 540710879_2283440602099160_578920509961118868_n.jpg]

conversations.body_text: Hi Golden-Jasiek,     Please download the latest version of the software and try manually updating the firmware.      Please go to Settings → Update → Check for Updates to perform the update. Once the update is complete, please unplug and reconnect the USB.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link
